# Delete an In-App Purchase Localization

**Web Service Endpoint**

Delete the metadata for a single in-app purchase localization.

## Discussion



## Endpoints

- **List All Localizations for an In-App Purchase**: Get a list of localized display names and descriptions for a specific in-app purchase.
- **Create an In-App Purchase Localization**: Create a localized display name and description for an in-app purchase.
- **Read In-App Purchase Localization Information**: Get the display name and description for a specific locale for an in-app purchase.
- **Modify an In-App Purchase Localization**: Update the display name and description for a specific locale of an in-app purchase.
